ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centers, offices, and administrative buildings. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with lifting loads using lifting devices such as cranes, hoists and winches. Specifically, this protocol relates to the risks associated with working in and around loads being lifted above the ground.
